scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures against a vibrant red and gold patterned background. On the left, a figure in a blue robe, identified by a halo, gestures with his hands as if speaking or teaching. Two other haloed heads emerge behind him. To the right, two figures are seated. One, in a pink robe, is looking upwards and gesturing with one hand. Another figure, dressed in blue and wearing a hat, is also looking upwards and gesturing with both hands. The ground beneath them is depicted as green.
